entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm and hail early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight except north 30 km/h gusting to 50 over southern sections overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 11.
entry.summary: Showers ending near noon then clearing. Wind light except north 30 km/h gusting to 50 over southern sections in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
